label: Description
value: Fork has three long curved tines, rounded shoulder and flat baluster-shapedneck ending in a threaded projection.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Tapering brass handle, round in section, engraved decoration of vertical bands with v-shaped patttern. Handle is hollow and screw-thread inside. (Handle does not fit on fork).

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Inside decorated with paper printed with a floral pattern. Red leather case for three implements, irregular shaped, oval in section, slightly tapering towards the bottom. Leather stamped and decorated with gold, chain-pattern along the sides and a stylized fleur-de-lis on the front.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Fork has three straight tines, rounded shoulders, flaring neck. Handle has straight sides with rounded ends. Silver scales engraved with floral decoration and gilded details, three rivets. Fork folds partly into blade.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Box for three implements, follows the shape of a spoon. Lid attached to bottom, two hooks and hinges on the front. Top of lid decorated with stamped floral motif. Two cartouches with illegible monograms, a vase with a flower in the centre of the top. Traces of gold. Inside of box covered with suede.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Box for three implements, follows the shape of a spoon. Lid attached to bottom with two small hinges on back small hooks and rings on front side. Top of lid stamped leather with gold; an urn with flowers in the centre, a laurel wreath and chains on each side, flowers, grapes and pears along the sides. Inside of box covered with green wool fabric.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Small knife, pointed narrow blade of steel. Brass handle rectangular and flat, terminating in pierced fleur-de-lis. Handle originally lettered, inlaid (?) with gothic letters (now illegible).

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Oval spoon bowl with engraved floral decoration on back of spoon. Flat tapering handle has floral engraving on both sides. Tapering handle, round in section, with filigree, floral and paisley design around a plain silver shaft. Rose at the end of handle.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Fork has two straight tines, angular shoulders and a baluster-shaped neck. Tapering handle, round in section, with filigree; floral and paisley design around a plain silver shaft. Rosette at the end of handle.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Saber-shaped blade, plain bolster. Tapering handle, round in section, with filigree; floral and paisley pattern around a plain silver shaft. Rosette at the top of handle.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Flat paper case for five implements covered with stamped leather, floral and scrolled design, some traces of gold.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Straight-sided blade with rounded ends, rounded bolster. Tapering brown ferrule with horizontal and vertical bands. Handle of black goat horn (Chamois, Latin name: Rupicapra rupicapra).

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Four tined fork, waisted shoulder, baluster-shaped neck. Tapering horn ferrule with carved horizontal and vertical bands. Handle of black goat horn (Chamois, Latin name: Rupicapra rupicapra).

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Rectangular case covered in leather with stamped triangular pattern. Inside covered with red damask. Hinges on the back, small rings and hooks on the front.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Rectangular wooden case, covered with shark skin, brass mounts, handle and lock plate with floral pattern. Two hinges on the back. Sloping front on inside has twelve square openings for the implements. Inside covered with silk and metal thread.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Sabre-shaped blade with plain bolster. Flat pistol-shaped brass handles with engraved decoration of stylized leaves near bolster. Decorative bands on the side of the handle.

label: Description
value:
a) leather outer case? marked: A Paris /chez Aucuc / Rue Saint-Honoré / No. 145 
b) silver cup, possibly American replacement; marked on bottom: sterling
c) leather inner case  case marked: A Paris /chez Aucuc / Rue Saint-Honoré / No. 145
d) knife/ corkscrew marked: Aucuc
e) spoon, Hanoverian pattern; marks: R / FUCHS?/ bird’s head? symbol
f) fork, Hanoverian pattern; maker’s marks rubbed 
g) mustard spoon
h, i, j) salt and pepper and cap
